name: Chroma Chameleon (TaintedFlameGames)
description:
Chroma Chameleon! A game by TaintedFlame Games for Kiwijam 2021

Morph and blend colours while utilising your tongue and tail to solve puzzles through various dynamic levels.

Controls:

W A S D to move, following the mouse

Left click to extend tongue

Right click to use the zipline

'E' to set Chroma's colours

'Q' to merge Chroma's colours
